message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can do $82.50. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Can you consider $78? I really think that's a fair price for this product.
I'm getting close, Bob! I can do $81. I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Can you consider $79? I really think that's a fair price for this product.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I think $81 is a great deal, and I'm willing to stand firm on that. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're firm on the price, Alice, but I'm afraid I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I can get the same product from another seller for $80, so I'll have to go with that option.
